DOC.brief_summary: Troponin major diagnostic criterion acute myocardial infarction ( AMI ) confirm myocardial damage necrosis . In out-of-hospital cardiac arrest ( OHCA ) patient dynamic diagnostic value often controversial well describe . Most prior study retrospective , use first generation troponin assay assess admission troponin . The aim work correlate dynamic sensitive troponin I urgent coronary angiography . Patients resuscitate OHCA prospectively divide three group base result urgent angiography . Serial assessment sensitive troponin I obtain initial 48 hour . We expect admission troponin predictive AMI . Over next hour troponin level high patient acute coronary lesion , low stable obstructive coronary disease insignificant non-obstructive coronary disease . We also expect significant difference high value dynamic troponin sub-group spontaneous reperfusion ( TIMI flow 2 3 ) comparing patient coronary occlusion ( TIMI flow 0 1 ) . In patient non-obstructive disease expect troponin level correlate duration cardiac arrest , number external electric shock cumulative dose adrenaline administer .
DOC.brief_title: Sensitive Troponin I Out-of-hospital Cardiac Arrest
DOC.criteria: female male 18 year old comatose survivor outofhospital cardiac arrest ( OHCA ) absence obvious noncoronary cause urgent coronary angiography admittance le 3 hour OHCA first troponin assessment admittance subacute myocardial infarction coronary spasm instent thrombosis within first 48 hour admission Coronary surgery death within first 48 hour admission
